verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I wanna follow You
With all my heart
I worship You, God

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
We have come to give You glory
We have come to give You praise

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
You're welcome in this place
You're welcome in this place
You're welcome in this place

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Have Your way, have Your way
Have Your way

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
We have come to give You glory
We have come to give You praise

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
You're welcome in this place
You're welcome in this place
You're welcome in this place

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
Have Your way, have Your way
Have Your way
